# @babel/helper-remap-async-to-generator

> Helper function to remap async functions to generators

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/helper-remap-async-to-generator
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/helper-remap-async-to-generator --dev
```
